text: Hader or Hadher may refer to: ==Places== *Hađer, Croatia *Hader, Minnesota, United States *Hader, Quneitra Governorate, Syria ==People with this surname== * Berta and Elmer Hader, an American couple who illustrated and wrote children's books * Bill Hader (b. 1978), an American actor, voice actor, comedian, producer and writer * Josef Hader (b. 1962), an Austrian comedian, actor, and writer * Josh Hader (b. 1994), an American professional baseball pitcher
title: Hader
